Summary: may be stars but ive never seen star that bright and blink so many different colors.
divs: Sighting Detailsin the sky to the west of buffalo ny, 3 star light object in the sky in a tri-angle formation across the sky. may be stars but ive never seen star that bright and blink so many different colors. i see what i think is mars, bright red and not blinking. The other stars in the sky have a very slight twinkle but not like these 3. The one is so bright and blinking red, white, purple, green crazy fast blinking. Not moving. noticed it at 11pm at night.
